lead_paragraph: Sebastian Vettel's hopes of fighting champions Mercedes for victory in Sunday's Bahrain Formula One Grand Prix went up in smoke before the start when his Ferrari's engine blew on the formation lap.

headline.print_headline: Vettel Out Before the Start in Bahrain
headline.main: Vettel Out Before the Start in Bahrain

snippet: Sebastian Vettel's hopes of fighting champions Mercedes for victory in Sunday's Bahrain Formula One Grand Prix went up in smoke before the start when his Ferrari's engine blew on the formation lap....
